is_playing.docs:
This Condition returns true while playback is active.

*See also: [`rtttl.is_playing` Condition](https://esphome.io/components/rtttl.html#rtttl-is-playing-condition)*

gain.docs:
**, Percentage**: With this value you can set the volume of the sound.

*See also: [Rtttl Buzzer](https://esphome.io/components/rtttl.html#configuration-variables)*

id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID used for code generation.

*See also: [Rtttl Buzzer](https://esphome.io/components/rtttl.html#configuration-variables)*

on_finished_playback.docs:
**, [Automation](https://esphome.io/automations/index.html#automation)**: An action to be performed when playback is finished.

*See also: [Rtttl Buzzer](https://esphome.io/components/rtttl.html#configuration-variables)*

output.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id of the [float output](https://esphome.io/components/output/index.html#output) to use for this buzzer.

*See also: [Rtttl Buzzer](https://esphome.io/components/rtttl.html#configuration-variables)*

speaker.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id of the [speaker](https://esphome.io/components/i2s_audio.html#i2s-audio) to play the song on.

*See also: [Rtttl Buzzer](https://esphome.io/components/rtttl.html#configuration-variables)*
